channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Your estate plan needs to be absolutely airtight. Here’s how to avoid mistakes.
item.description: If you don’t understand something in a document, don’t sign it.

item.title: How Nvidia’s stock can benefit from this emerging trend in AI models
item.description: As the industry shifts toward AI models with better memory and understanding, Citi expects a new Nvidia offering to best its competitors.

item.title: Why this veteran strategist is dropping his preference for tech stocks after 15 years
item.description: More competition is coming for the “juicy profit margins” of the “Magnificent Seven,” Ed Yardeni said, and he’s ready to look elsewhere for gains.

item.title: Intel, Adobe and these other ‘AI loser’ stocks could get left behind in the next phase of the tech boom
item.description: These 12 tech companies are most vulnerable to having their business models upended by the AI revolution, according to Wedbush Securities.

item.title: Paramount launches hostile bid for Warner Bros. with $108.4 billion offer, besting Netflix by $25 billion

item.title: Netflix gets a downgrade after announcing Warner Bros. film and streaming acquisition
item.description: Analyst Jeffrey Wlodarczak downgraded the streaming stock to a hold rating from buy.

item.title: NextEra to build 15 gigawatts of power for data centers by 2035
item.description: NextEra CEO John Ketchum acknowledged that the huge power demand from AI data centers is raising affordability concerns.

item.title: Next year could set a record for M&A. One Wall Street stock stands to benefit most in 2026
item.description: Bank of America sees Goldman Sachs adding 5% as it benefits from a record merger and acquisition cycle next year.

item.title: How to play further gains in copper using options on this mining stock
item.description: Michael Khouw breaks down the moves in copper and how to capitalize with options.

item.title: Bank of America hikes Carvana price target following S&P 500 inclusion announcement
item.description: Bank of America sees shares of Carvana adding 14% from here.
